title: Watch: Mike Pence ends his presidential campaign before it fails on its own after lame Ukraine comment
description:
All the world's a stage, and all the men and women merely players. Keep that Shakespeare quote in your mind. I'm going to get back to it.

The internet tells me Mike Pence took part in a CNN Town Hall for his presidential campaign. The internet also tells me Mike Pence is running for president. That should tell you how much of an impact the former vice president has made. He had a comment during the town hall that Joe Biden is not giving Ukraine money fast enough. Yes, that Joe Biden and that Ukraine.

Mike Pence complains that Joe Biden has been slow in providing Ukraine with military equipment. pic.twitter.com/pR0BtcAWWK
— The Post Millennial (@TPostMillennial) June 8, 2023

Set aside that Nikki Haley has already laid claim to the "we should be giving Ukraine MOAR money" wing of the GOP. She is easier on the eyes and has a personality. And set aside that somewhere between "hey, this is good content" and "hey, Zelenskyy's a dickhead," there has been a question of how much money is too much when that money can be spent here fixing our own problems.

All the GOP primary's a stage and the candidates merely players. Either Ron DeSantis or Donald Trump is going to be the nominee. I get the roles Haley, Chris Christie, Tim Scott, and Vivek Ramaswamy are playing. Some are running a longshot campaign. Others are auditioning for a cabinet role in the new administration. There's been insinuation that some of them have struck deals with the big two (Haley/Vivek with Trump, Christie with DeSantis) to play attack dog. It's a time-honored process. The GOP primary is both a performance as well as a process. I understand how it works.

Mike Pence, why are you here?

It's not your personality.

\u201cYour social media team needs to be blacklisted.\u201d
— Brodigan (@Brodigan) 1684346744

These bars when out of style when Tea Party grifters were fleecing grandparents out of their money to SAVE THE CONSTITUTION.

\u201cI\u2019m a Christian, a Conservative, and a Republican in that order! #Pence2024\u201d
— Mike Pence (@Mike Pence) 1686175020

In Pence's head, what exact role does he think he is playing? He can't win. He already put a book out. No one wants him on their team. He has negative charisma. Now he thinks he's going to be the hero of some silent majority of GOP primary voters who think Zelenskyy deserves more of our tax dollars.

I'm all about the primary process. Even as someone who is all-in for one of the candidates, I think six months of us debating is a good thing.

But no one likes you, Mike Pence. Go away.

>

<

Brodigan is Grand Poobah of this here website and when he isn't writing words about things enjoys day drinking, pro-wrestling, and country music. You can find him on the Twitter too.

title: Go get 'em, Skippy: Gavin Newsom proposes new constitutional amendment to overturn gun rights
description:
California Governor Gavin Newsom does not think there are enough constitutional amendments. He proposed a 28th Amendment today to instill leftist gun control in the United States Constitution. But NOT overturn the 2nd Amendment. Newsom says this won't encroach on that amendment at all.

Here, let him explain:

\u201cNEW: I\u2019m proposing the 28th Amendment to the United States Constitution to help end our nation\u2019s gun violence crisis.\n\nThe American people are sick of Congress\u2019 inaction.\n\nThe 28th will enshrine 4 widely supported gun safety freedoms -- while leaving the 2nd Amendment intact:\n\n1)\u2026\u201d
— Gavin Newsom (@Gavin Newsom) 1686227255
I’m proposing the 28th Amendment to the United States Constitution to do just that. The 28th Amendment will enshrine in the Constitution commonsense gun safety measures that Democrats, Republicans, Independents, and gun owners overwhelmingly support – while leaving the Second Amendment unchanged and respecting America’s gun-owning tradition.

His amendment would do four things:

  1. Raise the age to purchase a gun to 21 (at minimum)
  2. Universal background checks
  3. A "reasonable" waiting period for gun purchases
  4. Banning the civilian purchase of "assault weapons"

At this point, I can trust LwC fans understand all the policy reasons why this is insane. The words "assault weapons" alone don't mean anything other than what Democrats want them to mean at any given moment. Like when Joe Biden includes most handguns, even though Politifact claims Joe Biden saying that is not what we heard.

What I find interesting is the political. It's clear Gavin Newsom is making a calculation that Joe Biden won't make it to the 2024 ballot, and he wants to be the alternative. He has also put all his chips in on Ron DeSantis being the Republican nominee. It's why he has been trying and failing to attack DeSantis since last year.

This move is Newsom's "entry" into the Democrat primary. And you know something? Go get 'em, Skippy. I love this idea. If nothing else, at least a Democrat is being honest about gun control for a change. Instead of arguing that the Constitution says things that it doesn't say, he is using the mechanism our founding fathers left for us to use.

I think this is a brilliant idea and Democrats should spare no expense and no amount of resources to convince thirty-eight out of the fifty states to support a constitutional amendment that would TAKE AWAY some of their rights.

Only today's Democrat party has the balls to do this. The time is now. It's the right side of history. If not now then...you know, the thing.

>

<

Brodigan is Grand Poobah of this here website and when he isn't writing words about things enjoys day drinking, pro-wrestling, and country music. You can find him on the Twitter too.

title: DeSantis hits back hard at Newsom accusing him of trespassing: I'm giving ‘sanctuary states’ what they asked for
description:
Ron DeSantis has hit back at Gavin Newsom who has accused him of sending thirty-six -- yes, 36 -- illegal migrants to California. They were 36 WILLING immigrants who were looking forward to going to Sacramento. They were even laughing on the plane.

DeSantis thought this was what Newsom wanted.

BREAKING NEWS: DeSantis Responds To Gavin Newsom Calling Him A 'Small, Pathetic Man' www.youtube.com

Here's the thing, these Sanctuary jurisdictions are part of the reason we have this problem because they have endorsed and agitated for these types of open border policies. They have bragged that they are Sanctuary jurisdictions. They attack the previous administration's efforts to try to have border security. These are policies they've taken out and then when they have to deal with some of the fruits of that they, all of a sudden become very upset.

Here’s what the feud between Newsom and DeSantis shows:

Conservatives: turned a humid swamp into a fast-growing, business-friendly success.

Leftists: turned an area with unparalleled natural resources and beauty into a shithole.

Crowder and the gang discussed this and a lot more on today's show:

title: Watch: KJP exposes White House  border crisis hypocrisy, all it took was 16 migrants sent to a blue state
description:
Kudos to Texas Governor Greg Abbott. When that first bus of illegal asylum undocumenteds rolled into Washington DC and dropped the migrants off at their new home, he changed the conversation on illegal immigration. Suddenly, the pro-illegal Democrat party was concerned about interlopers being a drain on services and resources. Liberals preferred it when illegal immigration was a problem for small towns along the border and they could virtue signal about xenophobia from the comforts of their own homes.

Some, like White House press secretary Karien Jean-Pierre, still don't get it. This is evident by her comments about sixteen illegal migrants -- that's one less than seventeen and 10,284 less than 10,300 -- who were sent to California.

Karine Jean-Pierre says busing illegal immigrants from the border to other cities is "dangerous and unacceptable because you're actually putting a lot of pressure on these states and local areas." pic.twitter.com/Fc9yvMrlO1
— RNC Research (@RNCResearch) June 5, 2023
Busing or flying migrants around the country without any coordination with the federal government ... is dangerous and unacceptable ... because you're actually putting a lot of pressure on these states and local ... local areas.

The most incompetent of Joe Biden's diversity hires was talking about the sixteen migrants who were sent from Florida to California. Gov. Newson wants to charge Gov. DeSantis with kidnapping. Even though the illegals were all very excited about going to California. In DeSantis's defense, after Florida passed common sense illegal-immigration reform, he assumed Newsom would love to have the extra migrants. After all, Newsom bragged about California being an entire sanctuary STATE!

KJP says it puts a lot of pressure on these states to take an extra sixteen undocumented seeking asylum illegals.

\u201cNEW: Per CBP sources, Border Patrol apprehended more than 10,300 migrants who crossed illegally yesterday, and Monday also broke the 10,000 threshold. I\u2019m told these are the highest single day totals ever recorded - and it\u2019s expected to go even higher after T42 drops tomorrow.\u201d
— Bill Melugin (@Bill Melugin) 1683726881

Over 10,000 migrants crossing over A DAY putting pressure on the towns along the border?

The official White House position on that is "Meh."

>

<

Brodigan is Grand Poobah of this here website and when he isn't writing words about things enjoys day drinking, pro-wrestling, and country music. You can find him on the Twitter too.

title: WATCH TODAY'S SHOW: TRUMP FIRES CNN CEO CHRIS LICHT!
description:
Today is the first day of "Cultural Appropriation Month" and we're starting with FLORIDA! Gov. Newsom goes after DeSantis over the bussing of illegal immigrants into California. Apple comes out with a new augmented reality headset. CNN also fired their CEO. We're joined by Bryan Callen in 3rd chair & Beneil Dariush who will be fighting at UFC 289 this Saturday on PPV. Tune in!

NIKE TO REVEAL TRANS CLOTHING LINE FOR KIDS

  • A leaked email from inside of Nike and obtained by @realDailyWire reveals that the company will host a talk with a child sex change surgeon to celebrate pride month.
  • They're also set to unveil "gender inclusive" kids apparel:

CHRIS LICHT SAGA

  • CNN announces Chris Licht's departure on air
  • Chris Licht did what his bosses wanted...
  • CNN’s embattled chief ousted after staff revolt over Donald Trump interview
  • Scandal-ridden CNN sees ratings dive by 90% after 2021 coverage
  • CNN’s Ratings Collapse: Prime Time Down Nearly 70% In Key Demo
  • “Opinion: It won’t be long before extremists in the GOP make Trump look tame”
  • “Opinion: Eric Greitens’ ad typifies GOP extremists’ attitudes toward violence”
  • “Opinion: Republican extremists defending Trump could complicate their party’s chances”
  • Police arrest suspect in Florida's Hollywood Beach shooting that injured 9 on Memorial Day
  • Bud Light maker stripped of LGBTQ+ rating for caving to Dylan Mulvaney backlash
  • Target on the defensive after removing LGBTQ+-themed products from stores

NEWSOM FEUDS WITH DESANTIS

  • “What kind of human being does that?”
  • Joe: Gov. Newsom is calling out 'abhorrent' moves by DeSantis
  • BREAKING NEWS: DeSantis Responds To Gavin Newsom Calling Him A 'Small, Pathetic Man'
  • The Population of California Declined, Again
  • 2022 Domestic Net Migration by State
  • Governor says California’s budget deficit has grown to nearly $32 billion
  • Florida finishing 2022 with record $22 billion surplus
  • Downtown San Francisco continues to struggle as more businesses leave
  • Owner Abandons San Francisco Hotels as City Begs for Tourists to Return
  • South Florida business boom expected to outlive pandemic-era boost

title: Watch: Kids exposed to "t*tty weight lifting" during yet another all-ages drag show at a school
description:
Ok, drag queens. Take knee. I know many of you feel those of us on the right are too critical of your art. And you feel men dressed as women entertaining children is no different from dressing up as Chase from Paw Patrol or one of the characters from PJ Masks. Do you know what might bolster your case? NOT taking your clothes off and doing something called "t*tty push-ups" in front of children.

And calling it the “Illegal Drag Show” is like you are begging for someone to leak it exclusively to the youngbloods at Campus Reform.

When did drag become the paragon of leftist virtue?


Excellent question. There have always been drag shows. Adult men would dress up like women, give themselves a double entendre for a name, tell some raunchy jokes and entertain ADULTS in bars. If that's your thing, fine. Then minors would dress up like women and entertain adults in bars. Conservatives said, "hey, this seems inappropriate."

The left doubled down with "Drag Queen Story Time." Conservatives said, "guys, seriously, you're crossing a line here. Let's leave children alone because this is wrong."

Now if you DON'T support all drag queens all the time, you hate every single one of the Ls, Gs, Bs, especially the Ts, Qs, As, Is, other Is, Ps, and whatever the hell the +s are.

So it became a thing...out of spite?

T*tty weight lifting, though?


To be fair, while the "Illegal Drag Show: Be Gay, Do Crime" at Oregon State University was advertised for all ages, they did note the show would contain "adult themes." An argument could be made is should have been exclusive for adults in that case, but it's 2023.

A source tells Campus Reform that at least four small children were present during the entire show. Two were so small, adults had to sit them on their laps so they could see.

Footage also shows one of the drag queens leading a child on stage to be interviewed in front of the cheering audience. As the performer interviews, the child responds to a question with, "He's a full grown man."

However the t*tty weight lifting? That was a biological woman.

One performer—who appears to be a biological woman—fully exposes her breasts for the audience by stripping off all upper body clothing. The performer then tries to hold various objects under them, such as a wooden sword and "five pound" weights. Footage shows the individual eventually bringing out a ladder, as a "trans-masc" associate joins her to assist with the "titty weight lifting" feat.

If the artist was a biological woman -- really, who can tell these days -- that means instead of being a beautiful and brave drag queen living out loud with their best life, she was just a stripper?

In fairness to the drag queens and the one stripper, they may have assumed making the explicit sexual themes clear before the show would have meant no children in attendance. And that, even though it was "all ages," parents would know better.

When the left and the media (I repeat myself) lie about conservatives wanting to outlaw drag shows, we aren't talking about the brunches and bingo nights suburban housewives go to in bars. I get the appeal of raunchy comedy and rated R movies. If you are an adult, do your adult things.

It's events like this, infront of and promoted to children. And then being told by the media and the left we have to be okay with it.

>

<

Brodigan is Grand Poobah of this here website and when he isn't writing words about things enjoys day drinking, pro-wrestling, and country music. You can find him on the Twitter too.

title: Democrat governor VETOES bill that would have banned teachers from filming porn in their classrooms
description:
Anytime we write about Gov. Katie Hobbs, a reminder that Arizona could have had Kari Lake but went with this dingbat instead is implied. Kari Lake would NOT have vetoed a bill that banned teachers from filming pornos in their classrooms. Hobbs did, which I guess makes her in the pocket of Big Porn or something.

No, you read my words right. Katie Hobbs vetoed a bill that would have made it illegal for teachers to film pornography in their elementary school classrooms.


Why is this even a thing?


Last November, an Arizona teacher couple filmed their sex work inside the classroom THEY worked in. Teachers Samantha and Dillon Peer were employed by the Lake Havasu Unified School District. Students found their sexual OnlyFans content on the internet because that's how the internet works. The teachers were fired. Samantha released a whiny video on YouTube about why you should feel bad for her. SPOILER: I did not.

The move made OnlyFans reiterate their best practices about users not being allowed to film sex in a public place. It's one of two things you can't do on OnlyFans. The other is expressing support for the Second Amendment.

Why would the Governor veto such a common sense reform?


Katie Hobbs vetoed the bill because she was afraid if they banned filming porn in the classroom, it would also ban teachers from PROVIDING porn in the classroom.

The bill specifies porn that is “textual, visual or audio.” That goes too far for the Democrat Governor.

I have vetoed SB 1696. While I agree that not all content is appropriate for minors, this bill is a poor way to address those concerns. The sponsor has stated that this bill was aimed at preventing a specific action from reoccurring, while in reality it is written in such a vague manner that it serves as little more than a thinly veiled effort to ban books.

Hobbs is referencing states like Florida. Florida believes books about kids tasting their vagina slime, how to give a handy to make someone cum, or reading a graphic novel that explicitly illustrates two dudes f*cking are not appropriate in school, so they are being kept out of school libraries. Democrats who are pro-exposing kids to porn in the classroom like Katie Hobbs call that "book banning."

Even though, if you as a parent feel your kid learning about tasting their vagina slime, how to give a handy to make someone cum, or reading a graphic novel about two dudes f*cking is crucial to their development, you can go on Amazon.com and have the book by tomorrow.

Question: by Katie Hobbs vetoing a bill that would have banned pornography from being filmed in the classroom, isn't she admitting that pornography is being PROVIDED TO STUDENTS in the classroom?

Gov. Kari Lake would not have been a shill for Big Porn like Katie is. Just sayin'.

>

<

Brodigan is Grand Poobah of this here website and when he isn't writing words about things enjoys day drinking, pro-wrestling, and country music. You can find him on the Twitter too.
